citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:23am on
11/2/2022. The Licensee was reached via telephone upon arrival of the inspector. The licensee was out of state and
unavailable for inspection and another responsible party was not available.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:23am on 
11/2/2022.  The Licensee was reached via telephone upon arrival of the inspector.  The licensee was out of state and 
unavailable for inspection and another responsible party was not available. 
 
 
 
End Section
